metadata.name: Spotlight: FULL_SPECTRUM
metadata.description:
Spotlight is an exploration of minted works through conversation and curiosity. Through exhibitions in our network of physical spaces throughout the world, Spotlight sessions invite the artist & viewer to revisit exceptional projects from the Bright Moments ecosystem.

FULL_SPECTRUM is a 100 edition generative algorithm created by Lars Wander. Originally minted during Bright Moments Tokyo.
